name: Salvage Drone
desc: A salvage drone. It's about as effective as a normal crew at salvaging, but is worthless at everything else.

name: Combat Drone
desc: Combat drones have very effective wepons. It's a shame they have an tendency to walk straight into killboxes and other fortifications. Without the flexibility of normal combatants, they must be deployed in numbers to successfully overwhelm a foe.

name: Survey Drone
desc: A specialized survey drone. It's extremely effective at taking samples from the ground and exploring, much more so than normal crew.
